explains: n. 承办商；伙食承办商；供应粮食者；供应货物或提供服务的人或公司

sentences.en: Welcome to the world of Zara, purveyor of mass fashion.
sentences.cn: 欢迎来到Zara世界——大众时尚的代言人。

sentences.en: Its shops include a Dairy Queen, a Victoria's Secret and a purveyor of comic T-shirts.
sentences.cn: 其中点缀着诸如奶品皇后、维多利亚的秘密和无厘头风格T恤衫代理等品牌店面。

sentences.en: As a purveyor of "natural and organic produce", everything about Whole Foods shouts green.
sentences.cn: 作为“天然和有机产品”的供应者，全食超市的一切都打着绿色标签。
